mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS "noticeId", member_id AS "memberId", title AS "title", content AS "content", dir_Path AS "dirPath" FROM ( SELECT notice_id, member_id, title, content, dir_Path, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM notices ORDER BY notice_id DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT notice_id AS "noticeId", member_id AS "memberId", title AS "title", content AS "content", dir_Path AS "dirPath" FROM notices WHERE notice_id=#{noticeId}

SELECT notice_id AS "noticeId", member_id AS "memberId", title AS "title", content AS "content", dir_Path AS "dirPath" FROM ( SELECT notice_id, member_id, title, content, dir_Path, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM notices WHERE title LIKE #{keyword} OR content LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY notice_id DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notices WHERE title LIKE #{keyword} OR content LIKE #{keyword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices (notice_id, member_id, title, content, dir_path) VALUES (#{noticeId}, 1, #{title}, #{content}, #{dirPath})
